handler.name: Entity Changes Handler
handler.description: Handles entity creation, modification, and deletion based on ticket requirements

steps.name: Analyze Existing Entities
actions: Review all entities in src/Models directory
Identify entities affected by the ticket

steps.name: Determine Entity Changes
actions: List entities to be modified with specific changes
List new entities to be created
Identify folder structure for new entities

decision_criteria.modification: Entity exists but needs new properties or behavior
decision_criteria.creation: New business concept requires new entity
decision_criteria.deletion: Entity no longer needed in business logic

steps.name: Implement Entity Changes
actions: Ensure proper namespace and folder structure
requirements: All entities must inherit from appropriate base class
